sentences.en: ‘Catch me if you can,’ she said with a giggle.
sentences.cn: “你来抓我呀。”她咯咯地笑着说。

sentences.en: " Needless to say, you'll be the lucky one,'said the voice of Ming - feng , with a giggle.
sentences.cn: “ 不消说会挑到你, 你比我年纪大些, ” 鸣凤 说着, 忍不住噗嗤一笑.

sentences.en: All the boys except Piggy started to giggle.
sentences.cn: 除了猪崽子以外,所有的孩子们都吃吃地笑开了.

sentences.en: Both girls began to giggle.
sentences.cn: 两个女孩都咯咯地笑了起来。

sentences.en: He can't help a suppressed giggle.
sentences.cn: 他忍不住偷笑了一声。

sentences.en: He looked so ridiculous I got the giggles (= started to giggle ) .
sentences.cn: 他看上去太滑稽了，逗得我咯咯直笑。

sentences.en: His hand shot to his mouth to stifle a giggle.
sentences.cn: 他赶紧捂住嘴，不让自己笑出声来。

sentences.en: I desperately fought the urge to giggle.
sentences.cn: 我拼命地想忍住笑。

sentences.en: I did it only for a giggle.
sentences.cn: 我做那事只是为了取乐.

sentences.en: I might buy one for a friend's birthday as a giggle.
sentences.cn: 我可能会买一件送给朋友当生日礼物，逗他开心。

sentences.en: If you can’t stop giggling you’ll have to leave the room.
sentences.cn: 如果你再咯咯地笑个不停，就给我离开屋子。

sentences.en: Margaret was seized by a fit of the giggles (= she could not stop giggling ) .
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特忍不住咯咯笑了起来。

sentences.en: She gave a little giggle.
sentences.cn: 她咯咯地笑了一声。

sentences.en: She gave a little girlish giggle.
sentences.cn: 她像个小女孩一样咯咯地笑了笑。

sentences.en: She knew well enough who it was, and she suppressed a giggle.
sentences.cn: 好像知道是谁拧的, 她忍住了不笑,也不声张.

sentences.en: Soon the whole group had the giggles .
sentences.cn: 很快，组里所有的人都咯咯笑了起来。

sentences.en: The absurd story made her giggle.
sentences.cn: 那个荒谬的故事使她咯咯地笑了起来.

sentences.en: There was silence for a moment, then a giggle.
sentences.cn: 沉默了片刻之后,有人在吃吃地笑.

sentences.en: Today's lesson was a bit of a giggle.
sentences.cn: 今天的课真有趣.

sentences.en: Vicky suppressed a nervous giggle .
sentences.cn: 薇姬忍住了她紧张的傻笑。

sentences.en: Wouldn't it be a giggle to tie his shoe - laces together while he isn't looking!
sentences.cn: 趁他没注意时把他的鞋带拴在一起,岂不有趣!

trans.tran_cn: 咯咯的笑，傻笑，<英·非正>玩笑，the giggles 止不住的格格笑

trans.tran_en: to laugh quickly, quietly, and in a high voice, because something is funny or because you are nervous or embarrassed
to laugh quickly, quietly, and in a high voice, because something is funny or because you are nervous or embarrassed

trans.tran_cn: 咯咯地笑，傻笑，娇笑一下，情不自禁地笑出声来
trans.tran_en: to laugh quickly, quietly, and in a high voice, because something is funny or because you are nervous or embarrassed
